item.title: Termux-api之termux-dialog
item.description: 官方的命令讲解 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Usage: termux-dialog widget [options] Get user input w/ different widgets! Default: text -h, help Show this help -l, list List all widgets and their options -t, title Set title of input dialog (optional) 翻译后 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 #使用: termux-dialog widget [options] #获取用户输

item.title: Termux-api之termux-toast
item.description: 官方的命令讲解 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 Usage: termux-toast [-b bgcolor] [-c color] [-g gravity] [-s] [text] Show text in a Toast (a transient popup). The text to show is either supplied as arguments or read from stdin if no arguments are given. -h show this help -b set background color (default: gray) -c set text color (default: white) -g set
